title: Moderna Vaccine Whistleblowers Confirm Covid Jab Is Oncogenic and Causes Infertility | The Irish Sentinel
cleaned_text:
e key copy in the screenshot as explained by the 2 Moderna vaccine engineer is as follows:

How it actualy works from what we’ve uncovered:

1. Make mRNA coding for S protein

2. Make mRNA coding for mutant versions of CYP19A1 and CDKN1B in smaller amounts

3. Make sure that while delivery system for (1) mostly ends up in liver, most of (2) ends up in the gonads

4. Make sure that form and quantity of additive upregulating LINE-1 reverse transcription activity makes it hard to detect among adjuvants

5. Effects from (2) integrated by (4) are recessive; mildly oncogenic effects in vaccine recipient to be noticed for many years
